title: 微软修补被阿联酋黑客利用的零日漏洞
title_translated: Microsoft patches zero-day vulnerability exploited by UAE hackers.
summary: Microsoft patched a zero-day remote code execution vulnerability in WebDAV exploited by the UAE threat group Stealth Falcon for espionage activities. The group deployed malware, including keyloggers and backdoors, targeting organizations in Turkey, Qatar, Egypt, and Yemen through phishing emails and a custom implant named Horus Agent.
